segments.text: Hello . My name is John Sandals , and I've got a reservation .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: May I see some identification , sir , please ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Thank you so much . Have you got a credit card , Mr . Sandals ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I sure do . How about American Express ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Unfortunately , at the present time we take only MasterCard or VISA .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No American Express ? Okay , here's my VISA .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Thank you , sir . You'll be in room 507 , nonsmoking , with a queen-size bed . Do you approve , sir ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That's great . This is your key , sir . If you need anything at all , anytime , just dial zero .
segments.speaker: S2
